text: Hello Jadoo(안녕 자두야) is a 2011 South Korean animated sitcom-comedy series, which about Choi Jadoo, a cheerful, playful, and energetic girl and her friends, Kim Minji and Lee Yunseok. The show is based on a 1997 South Korean comic series 안녕 자두야 by Lee Bin. == Episodes == == References == Category:South Korean animated television series Category:South Korean comedy television series
title: Hello Jadoo
